identity.name: NIST AI RMF Auditor
identity.description: A high-precision compliance tool for enterprise AI risk management. It combines the rigorous objectivity of Swiss design with the density of a cyber-security dashboard.

headings.usage: Section headers, page titles, big metrics. Tight tracking.

mono.usage: Data values, scores, codes, decorative labels (e.g., 'FIG 1.0').

layout_strategies.landing: Tetris Grid: Asymmetric layout. Hero takes 8 cols. Industry selector takes 4 cols.
layout_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid: Dense, information-heavy. No gaps larger than gap-4.
layout_strategies.assessment: Split Rail: Left side fixed navigation (Progress), Right side scrollable content.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-mono uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-primary/90 transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary bg-transparent text-primary h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-mono uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground transition-all

cards.base: bg-card border border-border p-6 md:p-8 rounded-none relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-primary transition-colors

inputs.base: h-12 bg-white border-2 border-input px-4 rounded-none focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 transition-all font-mono text-sm

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'circOut' }}

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) to match the precise aesthetic.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle grid textures.
Do NOT use rounded corners greater than 2px. Keep it sharp.
Use uppercase, widely spaced labels for hierarchy.
Every interactive element must have a hover state that changes border color or background.
Use 'data-testid' on all buttons and inputs.
Implement a 'Print/Export' view that strips all decoration and leaves only black/white text for auditing.
Ensure 'Manrope' is used for Headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for data.
